urls.title: Flying with us during COVID19
Worldwide contact center
urls.description: Have you tried searching for your query on gulfair.com? Ticket bookings,Timetable, Flight Status and more are just a click away! For telephone assistance with your queries, our reservation sales agents are available to serve you 24 x 7. Our World Wide Contact Center offers convenient facilities. You can book your ticket and pay through your credit card (Visa, Master or American Express) or get a time limit to pay later. Or if you have an existing booking, our call center helps you upgrade your class, change your flight date, reroute your flight or request special services like wheelchair, meet and assist, seat assignment and special meal or even cancel the booking. You can also update your booking profile details like Falconflyer Programme number, telephone numbers, email address and travel documents info. We have assigned a special line for our Falconflyer Programme members. FFP members can redeem miles for new bookings or upgrade an existing booking from Economy to Falcon Gold. Membe

data.text:
لقد أضفنا رحلة أسبوعية إضافية إلى #مسقط وزدنا عدد رحلاتنا إلى #الدمام إلى 6 رحلات أسبوعية، مما سيوفر لكم المزيد من خيارات السفر لرحلاتكم.  نتطلع دائماً إلى الترحيب بكم على متن طائراتنا!
لا تنسوا زيارة https://t.co/qR39vVK3BA  للحصول على آخر إرشادات السفر وإجراءات السلامة. https://t.co/WcWDVqnuNt

Kindly visit the link below for more information:

Thank you,

urls.description: Have you tried searching for your query on gulfair.com? Ticket bookings,Timetable, Flight Status and more are just a click away! For telephone assistance with your queries, our reservation sales agents are available to serve you 24 x 7. Our World Wide Contact Center offers convenient facilities. You can book your ticket and pay through your credit card (Visa, Master or American Express) or get a time limit to pay later. Or if you have an existing booking, our call center helps you upgrade your class, change your flight date, reroute your flight or request special services like wheelchair, meet and assist, seat assignment and special meal or even cancel the booking. You can also update your booking profile details like Falconflyer Programme number, telephone numbers, email address and travel documents info. We have assigned a special line for our Falconflyer Programme members. FFP members can redeem miles for new bookings or upgrade an existing booking from Economy to Falcon Gold. Membe

اليوم نحتفل بجميع الرجال والنساء الذين يرتدون تلك السترة العاكسة ويعملون على مدار الساعة لضمان سلامة المسافرين والتأكد من جاهزية جميع طائراتنا للإقلاع!

#طيران_الخليج #البحرين https://t.co/9GxEwTvgar

فخورون بكوننا إحدى أولى الناقلات الجوية التي دخلت في شراكة مع الاتحاد الدولي للنقل الجوي (IATA) لإطلاق تطبيق IATA Travel Pass للجوّال في المنطقة. سنخبركم عندما يتم العمل بهذا التطبيق حتى تكونوا من أوائل من يجربه!

 #طيران_الخليج #البحرين https://t.co/GEU1SRM2pD

data.text:
@MahmoodNahash Hello!
Thanks for getting in touch with Gulf Air.
Kindly note that Fare & Tax difference may apply.
For more details, please contact our Worldwide Contact Centre in order to explain the Terms & Conditions**
Stay safe ...

We’re proud to trial IATA Travel Pass and join the growing number of carriers to partner with IATA in this exciting project! We’ll let you know when it’s live so you can be one of the first to try it out!

 #GulfAir #Bahrain #IATA https://t.co/upsbb7ha5a

data.text: @itooomyyy نوصي بشدة بمراجعة متطلبات الدخول عن طريق الاتصال بالسفارة أو القنصلية المحلية. لا تتحمل شركة طيران الخليج المسؤولية إذا فشل أحد الركاب في الحصول على الأوراق الصحيحة اللازمة لرحلته ، أو تم رفضه من الصعود إلى الطائرة ، أو رفض الدخول إلى بلد من قبل السلطات لعدم الامتثال للوائحها.

@KhawlaAlShayji عليكم السلام
 
شكرا لتواصلك مع طيران الخليج
نحيطكم علما بانه لا يتوجب على المسافرين اي فحص طبي في فتره الانتظار في مطار البحرين الدولي ..
 
شكرا

Please note that you will be informed regarding the duration once you will be tested. However for more details, please check with the concerned authorities. 
Stay safe ...

urls.title: Worldwide contact center
urls.description: Have you tried searching for your query on gulfair.com? Ticket bookings,Timetable, Flight Status and more are just a click away! For telephone assistance with your queries, our reservation sales agents are available to serve you 24 x 7. Our World Wide Contact Center offers convenient facilities. You can book your ticket and pay through your credit card (Visa, Master or American Express) or get a time limit to pay later. Or if you have an existing booking, our call center helps you upgrade your class, change your flight date, reroute your flight or request special services like wheelchair, meet and assist, seat assignment and special meal or even cancel the booking. You can also update your booking profile details like Falconflyer Programme number, telephone numbers, email address and travel documents info. We have assigned a special line for our Falconflyer Programme members. FFP members can redeem miles for new bookings or upgrade an existing booking from Economy to Falcon Gold. Membe

data.text:
